scripts.test: webpack src/check.test.js --mode development --display errors-only --output tmp/check.test.js --target node && node tmp/check.test.js
scripts.dist:commonjs2: webpack src/index.js --mode production --target web --output-library-target commonjs2 --output dist/check.commonjs2.js
scripts.dist: yarn test && yarn dist:web && yarn dist:node && yarn dist:commonjs2
